EmailTemplate.name: Symphony Employer Just Signed
EmailTemplate.subject: Employer has signed the proposal.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear ,
{!Soldcase_Symphony__c.Signed_Employer_First_Name__c} {!Soldcase_Symphony__c.Signed_Employer_Last_Name__c} has the proposal and now requires your attention.
Please click here to view the proposal.
The Symphony Team.
